EmailTemplate.description: Notify installer of credit approval. Direct installers to fill out the installer form.
EmailTemplate.name: RL - Installer_Ready to Reqeust Funds Disbursal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name} - Credit Approved - Information Needed to Disburse Funds
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
The Solar Loan Application for {!Opportunity.Name} has been approved. We now need you to give us some information about the Solar Installation so we can disburse funds.
Please complete the installer update form to update his/her information and to request the initial funds disbursal. You will need to enter the information below in order to update the correct customer's record. Please keep in mind that the Referral Code is CASE SENSITIVE
Customer Name: {!Opportunity.Name}
Referral Code Used: {!Opportunity.Custom_ID__c}
Please do not forget to attach your agreement between {!Opportunity.Name} and {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c}.
You can access the update form at any time by scrolling to the bottom of our homepage at www.bluewavesolar.com
Thank you,
BlueWave Customer Care
